title: Was the Raggedy Ann Doll Modeled After a Child Killed by a Vaccine?
subtitle: Raggedy Ann's creator filed patents for the doll several months before his daughter fell ill and died, rendering an old claim about vaccines chronologically impossible.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Raggedy Ann dolls were created by a grief-stricken father who lost his daughter to a vaccine-related illness, and who wished to broadcast the risks of vaccination.
